metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14970 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In lib/ofp-util.c in Open vSwitch (OvS) before 2.8.1, there are multiplememory leaks while parsing malformed OpenFlow group mod messages. NOTE: thevendor disputes the relevance of this report, stating "it can only betriggered by an OpenFlow controller, but OpenFlow controllers have muchmore direct and powerful ways to force Open vSwitch to allocate memory,such as by inserting flows into the flow table."

criterions.comment: openvswitch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
